title: Nexus among the perceived infrastructural, social, economic, and environmental impact of CPEC: A case of Pakistan
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Syed Umair Anwar, Peng Zhi Yuan, Zhang Wuyi, Syed Muhammad Amir, Shafique Ur Rehman, Lifan Yang, Syed Zahid Ali Shah
